alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Cass; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 9:20PM CDT until April 12 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Greene County in west central Iowa... Northwestern Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Western Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Audubon County in west central Iowa... Southern Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Audubon to near Walnut, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Audubon around 925 PM CDT. Coon Rapids around 940 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 69. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Iowa.
